column5: This space is located on the 2nd-story of our home. We live in a nice neighborhood near downtown Friso. You can access laundry, patio & BBQ, and hot tub. We have a living room, TV, and kitchenette with the basics for light cooking and a full fridge for food. Scenic greenbelt nearby as well as freeway access to Dallas metroplex of shopping, dining & entertainment. We are warm and welcoming hosts!
column8: Spacious Room with private bath in custom home
